DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the Symbicort® Turbuhaler® to both Pulmicort® Turbuhaler® and Bricanyl® Turbuhaler® for the treatment of asthma after discharge from the emergency room
DOC.brief_title: Prevention of Asthma Relapse After Discharge From Emergency
DOC.criteria: 18 65 years of age Presenting at a study emergency department with an asthma exacerbation Admission to hospital Patients receiving more than 2000 µg/day of beclomethasone equivalent inhaled corticosteroids (1000 µg/day fluticasone or 1600 µg/day budesonide)
